SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
NONPROFIT CLOUD
Review and Report on Programs and Benefits

Review the easy-to-access quick reporting numbers, such as the count of all program participants, total active program participants, and total disbursed quantity for a benefit. With Actionable Relationship Center (ARC), review your object relationships in an easy-to-navigate graph. Generate reports to get an up-to-date view of your programs and benefits, such as the quantity of benefits delivered for all benefits across all programs, count of active program participants.

NOTE Salesforce offers Nonprofit Cloud, which includes integrated platform solutions for Fundraising, Program Management, Case Management, and Grantmaking. This content provides information about these solutions. Find the managed package documentation in Salesforce for Nonprofits. If you’re not sure which version your organization uses, check with your Salesforce admin.

Reporting helps you analyze the data to track and evaluate the effectiveness of your programs and benefits. You can identify trends and make thoughtful and informed decisions.

Review Quick Counts
Get a quick view of your data in the Program Management app by using counts on some object details pages. Include the quick count fields in your reports.
View Graphical Representations of Program Relationships
Use Actionable Relationship Center (ARC), an interactive display component, to understand relationships among objects in an easy-to-navigate graph.
Review of Participant Profile from the Account Record Page
The Account record page layout for a program or benefit participant gives you a holistic picture of the participant and helps you gain insights about them. On a single page, you can view their personal details, their upcoming and used benefit disbursements, interaction summaries, associated complaints and alerts, and more. For example, a program manager can use the benefit disbursement timeline to understand the upcoming sessions that the participant enrolled in.
Track Program and Benefit Activities Chronologically with Timeline
Track key events and activities related to a program or benefit with the Timeline component. Program managers and other users can get information about upcoming, past, and current activities related to a program or benefit from a timeline on a record page.
